TextView.android:text: Hello World! I am Ayush Ghosal. I am a college student in Kolkata currently pursuing B.Tech CSE from Techno Main Salt Lake. I love to play flute and also play octapad in our band. I aspire to be an android developer at Google and a freelance white hat hacker, better called a Penetration Tester or Security Analyst.

I created I Know What None Does as my personal project and to provide a platform to the World for sharing their unexplainable experiences. I believe that supernaturalism do exist in the World and it has an undeniable impact on our existence and evolution.
